mapper.sql: select tour_id, title, sub_heading, content, created_date, total_hour, hash_tag, personnel, transportation, price, city_id from tour
mapper.select: select * from tour as t left outer join tour_guidance_photo p on t.tour_id = p.tour_id join tour_theme as toth on t.tour_id = toth.tour_id join theme as th on toth.theme_id = th.theme_id join city as ci on t.city_id = ci.city_id join country as co on ci.country_id = co.country_id where t.tour_id = #{value};
mapper.insert:
insert into tour_guidance_photo(tour_id, photo_name, photo_path) values
(#{item.tourNo}, #{item.name}, #{item.path})
mapper.select: select count(*) from member_tour_wishlist where member_id = #{memberNo} and tour_id = #{tourNo}

select * from member_tour_wishlist as m join tour as t on m.tour_id = t.tour_id join city as c on t.city_id = c.city_id join tour_guidance_photo as tg on tg.tour_id = t.tour_id join tour_theme as toth on t.tour_id = toth.tour_id join theme as th on toth.theme_id = th.theme_id where member_id = #{memberNo} and city_name = #{cityName}

select * from tour as t join city as c on t.city_id = c.city_id join tour_guidance_photo as tg on tg.tour_id = t.tour_id join tour_theme as toth on t.tour_id = toth.tour_id join theme as th on toth.theme_id = th.theme_id where date(created_date) between subdate(curdate(),date_format(curdate(),'%w')-1) and subdate(curdate(),date_format(curdate(),'%w')-7);
select price from tour where price=(select max(price) from tour) limit 1

select distinct co.continent, co.country_name from tour as t join city as ci on t.city_id = ci.city_id join country as co on ci.country_id = co.country_id where co.continent = #{continent} order by co.continent desc

select distinct co.continent, co.country_name, ci.city_name from tour as t join city as ci on t.city_id = ci.city_id join country as co on ci.country_id = co.country_id where co.country_name = #{country} order by co.continent desc
